declaration.accept: I confirm that I will administer the estate of the person who died according to law, and that my application is truthful.
declaration.confirm: We confirm that we will administer the estate of Multiple exe journey Dec FN Multiple exe journey Dec LN, according to law. We will:
declaration.requests: If the probate registry (court) asks us to do so, we will:
declaration.confirmItem2: keep full details (an inventory) of the estate
declaration.confirmItem3: keep a full account of how the estate has been administered
declaration.requestsItem1: provide the full details of the estate and how it has been administered
declaration.requestsItem2: return the grant of probate to the court
declaration.understandItem1: our application will be rejected if we do not answer any questions about the information we have given
declaration.understandItem2: criminal proceedings for fraud may be brought against us if we are found to have been deliberately untruthful or dishonest

legalStatement.intro: This statement is based on the information ExeFN  ExeFN has given in their application. It will be stored as a public record.
legalStatement.applicant: We, ExeFN  ExeFN of 8 Neville Road London E7 9QX, diff Exe2FNLN of 6 Neville Road London E7 9QX and diff Exe3FNLN of 22 Neville Road London E7 9QX, make the following statement:
legalStatement.deceased: Multiple exe journey Dec FN Multiple exe journey Dec LN was born on 1 January 1900 and died on 2 February 2000, domiciled in England and Wales.
legalStatement.deceasedOtherNames: They were also known as Multiple exe FN Multiple exe LN.
legalStatement.deceasedEstateValue: The gross value for the estate amounts to £456677 and the net value for the estate amounts to £321231.
legalStatement.deceasedEstateLand: To the best of our knowledge, information and belief, there was no land vested in Multiple exe journey Dec FN Multiple exe journey Dec LN which was settled previously to the death (and not by the will) of Multiple exe journey Dec FN Multiple exe journey Dec LN and which remained settled land notwithstanding such death.

value.executor: exe4, an executor named in the will, is not making this application but reserves power to do so at a later date. They have been notified in writing.
exe5, an executor named in the will, is not making this application because they died before Multiple exe journey Dec FN Multiple exe journey Dec LN died.
exe6, an executor named in the will, is not making this application because they died after Multiple exe journey Dec FN Multiple exe journey Dec LN died.

value.name: ExeFN  ExeFN, an executor named in the will as diff SingleExeCaseDataFN, is applying for probate. Their name is different because ExeFN  ExeFN got married.
value.sign: ExeFN  ExeFN will send to the probate registry what they believe to be the true and original last will and testament of Multiple exe journey Dec FN Multiple exe journey Dec LN.

value.name: diff Exe2FNLN, an executor named in the will as exe2, is applying for probate. Their name is different because diff Exe2FNLN changed their name by deed poll.
diff Exe3FNLN, an executor named in the will as exe3, is applying for probate. Their name is different because diff Exe3FNLN: diff reason  Exe3.
